roleset.name: still needed, but never actually scheduled
roleset.note: OVERDUE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-01, due.01. (from overdue.01-j)

roles.note: Arg0 occurs with the corresponding sense 'due-v.01', but is very awkward here. If it actually comes up, add it. (from overdue.01-j)

example.name: arg2
example.text: Perhaps this rematch has been too long overdue and that it has withered on the vine . But nonetheless fan's of either fighter -LRB- I 'm a Cotto fan -RRB- will no doubt salivate as they make their ring walk .

example.name: arg2
example.text: I believe a discussion on limiting the size of weapons civilians may possess is overdue .
example.arg: a discussion on limiting the size of weapons civilians may possess

example.name: both args
example.text: She is overdue for a hip replacement

roleset.name: past the scheduled time for
roleset.note: OVERDUE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on due-j.03. (from overdue.02-j)

role.descr: what arg1 was scheduled to do/undergo/occur

example.name: both args
example.text: What happens if I am overdue in returning an interlibrary loan book?
example.arg: in returning an interlibrary loan book

example.name: both args, EXT
example.text: She is 3 weeks overdue (to give birth)

example.name: both args, EXT
example.text: The baby is 3 weeks overdue (to be born)
